org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event

Class BeehiveEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecs.ecsbeekeeping.event.BeehiveEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class BeehiveEventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    An Observer which listens to all the events generated by the garden and handles each one By printing a description of each event to the console
